name: Wormhole Experiment VR
description:
A short VR puzzle experience in space.
Travel through a wormhole and see what's on the other side. Scan the system and return to earth, as long as nothing goes wrong...

This is a game that me and a fellow student (Santeri Johansson) developed for a year for our final thesis. I was in charge of 3D, Audio and visuals while he was in charge of implementing VR and managing Steam VR Unity plugin and coding.

Developed with HTC Vive. Requires SteamVR.

If a tool doesn't work, check your bindings in steam vr bindinings for your controllers and see the Tools tab.

Tested to work with Occulus Rift, Valve Index and Mixed Reality.
